title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.20 - Vision obstruction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.20 - Vision obstruction

State Regulations

The vision of the operator of an automotive vehicle or piece
of mobile equipment shall not be obstructed by an extended superstructure or
load. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
